short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create cool cover photos online using your own photos, texts and spice up your facebook profile.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have the photos from the vacation you took or from a memorable event in the past? If you have the photos you like, then here is the app to make a nice facebook cover out of it. Add photos you like, insert text to express your idea, your feelings and make an awesome cover photo to spice up your profile.


Also check out the newer version of the cover maker at http://picbash.com/pic-maker
